name: Martial Exercise
summary: You've become comfortable in using weapons that you might not have picked up before training with the Swords.
description:
You've become comfortable in using weapons that you might not have picked up before training with the Swords. Choose one weapon group, such as hammer or sword. Whenever your proficiency rank in any weapon increases to expert or beyond, you also gain that new proficiency rank with both simple and martial weapons of your chosen weapon group.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
